languages.text: "Не робей, Френзо. Просто скажи, что можно сделать, чтобы людям жилось хотя бы капельку лучше".

traits.locale_text: "Не робей, Френзо. Просто скажи, что можно сделать, чтобы людям жилось хотя бы капельку лучше".

languages.text: "Don't be shy, Frensoe. Just tell me what you think we could do to make those people's lives at least a little better."
languages.original_text: "Не робей, Френзо. Просто скажи, что можно сделать, чтобы людям жилось хотя бы капельку лучше".

traits.locale_text: "Don't be shy, Frensoe. Just tell me what you think we could do to make those people's lives at least a little better."
"Don't be shy, Frensoe. Just tell me what you think we could do to make those people's lives at least a little better."
"Don't be shy, Frensoe. Just tell me what you think we could do to make those people's lives at least a little better."
"Don't be shy, Frensoe. Just tell me what you think we could do to make those people's lives at least a little better."
"Don't be shy, Frensoe. Just tell me what you think we could do to make those people's lives at least a little better."
"Don't be shy, Frensoe. Just tell me what you think we could do to make those people's lives at least a little better."
"Don't be shy, Frensoe. Just tell me what you think we could do to make those people's lives at least a little better."

languages.text: "Nicht so schüchtern, Frensoe. Sagt mir einfach, was wir in Euren Augen tun könnten, um diesen Leuten das Leben ein wenig zu erleichtern."
languages.original_text: "Don't be shy, Frensoe. Just tell me what you think we could do to make those people's lives at least a little better."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht so schüchtern, Frensoe. Sagt mir einfach, was wir in Euren Augen tun könnten, um diesen Leuten das Leben ein wenig zu erleichtern."

languages.text: « Ne soyez pas timide, Frensoe. Allons, dites-moi ce que nous pourrions faire pour améliorer un peu les conditions de vie de ces gens. »
languages.original_text: "Don't be shy, Frensoe. Just tell me what you think we could do to make those people's lives at least a little better."

traits.locale_text: « Ne soyez pas timide, Frensoe. Allons, dites-moi ce que nous pourrions faire pour améliorer un peu les conditions de vie de ces gens. »

languages.text: «Hable con franqueza, Frensoe. Cuénteme qué cree que podríamos hacer para mejorar las vidas de esta gente aunque sea solo un poco».
languages.original_text: "Don't be shy, Frensoe. Just tell me what you think we could do to make those people's lives at least a little better."

traits.locale_text: «Hable con franqueza, Frensoe. Cuénteme qué cree que podríamos hacer para mejorar las vidas de esta gente aunque sea solo un poco».

languages.text: 「恥ずかしがるな、フレンソー。あの者たちの生活を少しでも良くするために{mf|俺|私}たちに何ができるのか、教えてくれ」
languages.original_text: "Don't be shy, Frensoe. Just tell me what you think we could do to make those people's lives at least a little better."

traits.locale_text: 「恥ずかしがるな、フレンソー。あの者たちの生活を少しでも良くするために{mf|俺|私}たちに何ができるのか、教えてくれ」

languages.text: “别不好意思，弗伦索。告诉我，如果我们打算稍微改善一下这些人的生活状况，你觉得应该怎么做才好？”
languages.original_text: "Don't be shy, Frensoe. Just tell me what you think we could do to make those people's lives at least a little better."

traits.locale_text: “别不好意思，弗伦索。告诉我，如果我们打算稍微改善一下这些人的生活状况，你觉得应该怎么做才好？”

languages.text: "Çekinmene gerek yok Frensoe. Bu insanların hayatlarını bir nebze de olsa iyileştirmek için elimizden gelenlere dair ne düşündüğünü söylesen yeter."
languages.original_text: "Don't be shy, Frensoe. Just tell me what you think we could do to make those people's lives at least a little better."
